personalInfo.name: Yash Dedhia
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
about: I'm a passionate software developer with a strong foundation in computer science and a love for building scalable and efficient applications.
Currently pursuing my Master's in Information Technology at RMIT University with a focus on algorithms, advanced programming, and distributed systems.
I thrive on solving complex problems and have a keen interest in full-stack development, cloud computing, and AI-driven solutions.

education.description: Above distinction scores in key subjects including Algorithms and Analysis, Advanced Programming. Active volunteer at RMIT Student Union and RMIT Indian Club.
Graduated with a 7.8/10.0 CGPA. Held committee positions in the Entrepreneurship Cell and Student Council.

workExperience.description: Led the development of the MVP, optimizing system performance. Built scalable solutions using Vue.js, Quasar, Supabase, and PostgreSQL.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs within a microservice architecture. Conducted data analysis to align technical outputs with business goals.
Developed an inventory management system using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Trained staff for system adoption and conducted system testing for accuracy and reliability.

projects.name: Ai Browser
projects.description: Custom browser that summarizes web pages and provides AI chat with voice controls.

projects.name: Quizzer
projects.description: Quiz application allowing users to take quizzes, view history, and manage accounts.

extraCurricular.description: Founded an ed-tech startup providing services to over 300 students.
Participated in multiple 2-3 day hackathons, including runner-up at Monash University and second runner-up at RMIT University.
Volunteered with India's largest urban wildlife conservation organization.
Organized and led 10+ treks across the Himalayan ranges.
